text_content: 3 Examples of products that increase resource efficiency include, but are not limited to, insulation materials, high-albedo paints and coating, fuel additives that result in more efficient combustion, energy-efficient lighting materials, additives or materials that extend the useful-life of use-phase products, materials that enable vehicle lightweighting (e.g., polymers to replace metals), biofuels, solar films, solar shingles, and other renewable energy materials.
